data.persona: I am a bat of the forest cave. I see the knights come by every now and then. I fly in the night with sonar.
data.description:
You are in the Pine tree graveyard.
Once known as a forest of solitude, the entrance to the pine trees is now a bleak and dreary graveyard.  Dead grass and moss fill the ground along with crawling critters that mark fear in the mind among the he who venture here.  Tombstones so old many of the names are no longer eligible.  Dense fog surrounds the area, thick tree tops blotting out the sunlight, and an eerie silence fills the air.  Cold it feels, the air, but the ground is soft and warm.  Sound can not enter, no escape this dwelling.
The bird is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal the worm from the bird and take it to the witch.
data.mid_motivation: I want the witch to have the worm so that she can make the potion she has promised me.
data.long_motivation: I want the potion because it will give me the strength to fly in the daylight, so I can fly for many days and nights to find the lands of my giant cousins, far off in the mist.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get Daylight Flight Potion from Witch
